_header: False love when six setteth against eight
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 398.
_description: A Political Prophecy — at least twenty lines in quatrains

CULKk616.Transcription:
Fals love whan vi setteth ayenst viij[ ] of temtacion[ ] when vi
                    ous[ ]eth viij[ ] es in Ingland shal
                    gret tribulacion[ ] to a
                    bank[ ]yler & wepe[ ] litil thank[ ] shal0l ben in prisoun
                    ful depe[ ] proffre peas[ ] springe ful wideBut alyens therefor
                    shal lepe hedlesBut Efter [ ] abideThe ii portis [ ]
                    plentiefflaunders [ ] shal betthat [ ] shal[ ][ ][
                    ][ ][ ]telistes shal [ ]reste
CULKk616.Note: Twenty lines, most of them illegible because of stains.
